ScheduleBroadcastTerritory.name: ScheduleBroadcastTerritory
ScheduleBroadcastTerritory.description: Represent service territories to which a schedule broadcast is sent.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

ScheduleBroadcastId.description: The parent schedule broadcast associated with the schedule broadcast territory.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: The service territory associated with the schedule broadcast.
